original_text:
“This will be the sign for you, Hezekiah:
“This year you will eat what grows by itself,
    and the second year what springs from that.
But in the third year sow and reap,
    plant vineyards and eat their fruit.
korean_text: 왕이여 이것이 왕에게 징조가 되리니 올해는 스스로 난 것을 먹을 것이요 둘째 해에는 또 거기에서 난 것을 먹을 것이요 셋째 해에는 심고 거두며 포도나무를 심고 그 열매를 먹을 것이니이다

sentences.original_text: This will be the sign for you, Hezekiah:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너 히스기야를 위한 표징이 되리라:

sentences.original_text: This year you will eat what grows by itself,
sentences.korean_translation: 금년에는 스스로 난 것을 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and the second year what springs from that.
sentences.korean_translation: 내년에는 그 뿌리에서 난 것을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: But in the third year sow and reap,
plant vineyards and eat their fruit.
